segments.text: I can't believe my eyes; the sink is flooding the whole counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely zoned in on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out, and she hasn't turned off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's submerged in the puddleâ€” how hasn't she noticed?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the boy on the stool by the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, but the stool's about to go.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar's full, and he's using a plate to hold them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, hand outstretched in excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such an unexpected family fiasco.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks serene, totally opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get caught in their cookie caper.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so precarious; my heart skips a beat.
segments.speaker: PAR
